蕬蕬蕬

蕬字的基本解释

蕬
sī
〔菟蕬〕同“菟丝”，一种细茎草本植物，多附着在豆类植物上生长。
古书上说的一种水草。

蕬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sī］
［《廣韻》息兹切，平之，心。］
草名。兔丝。

蕬字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1059第08
【集韻】新兹切，音絲。【類篇】菟蕬，藥草。本作絲。　又【正字通】引《玉堂閒話》：蕬草，江南水草，葉如薤，隨水深淺而生。

蕬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蕬字的起名意思

暂无。

Wok
Basic explanation of words
Wok
sī
[Dodder] Same as "Dodder", a thin-stemmed herb that grows on bean plants.
A kind of aquatic plants mentioned in ancient books.
Wok
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sī]
["Guangyun" Xiziqi, Pingzhi, Heart. ]
Cursive name. Rabbit silk.
Wok
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蕬; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1059-08
[Jiyun] Xinzqie, Yinsi. 【Classes】Dodder, medicinal herb. This made silk.　[Zhengzitong] Quoting "Yutang Gossip": Long grass, Jiangnan water grass, leaves like scallions, which grow with the depth of the water.
